sections.paragraph: 1. to recommend, to commend, to give approval to; to show, to prove, to demonstrate
2. to hold together, to have one's proper place to be formed, to consist to stand with or beside

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G4862 and G2476 (including its collateral forms); to set together, that is, (by implication) to introduce (favorably), or (figuratively) to exhibit; intransitively to stand near, or (figuratively) to constitute: - approve, commend, consist, make, stand (with).
